org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.frontend

Class RMMonitoringImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.frontend.RMMonitoringImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.objectweb.proactive.Active, org.objectweb.proactive.InitActive, org.objectweb.proactive.RunActive, RMEventListener, RMMonitoring

    public class RMMonitoringImpl
extends Object
implements RMMonitoring, RMEventListener, org.objectweb.proactive.InitActive, org.objectweb.proactive.RunActive
    Active object designed for the Monitoring of the Resource Manager. This class provides a way for a monitor to ask at Resource Manager to throw events generated by nodes and nodes sources management. RMMonitoring dispatch events thrown by RMCore to all its monitors.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 0.9
    See Also:
    RMEventListener

      • addRMEventListener

        public RMInitialState addRMEventListener(RMEventListener stub,
                                         RMEventType... events)
        Register a new Resource manager listener. Way to a monitor object to ask at RMMonitoring to throw RM events to it.
        Specified by:
        addRMEventListener in interface RMMonitoring
        Parameters:
        stub - a listener object which implements RMEventListener interface.
        events - list of wanted events that must be received.
        Returns:
        RMInitialState snapshot of RM's current state : nodes and node sources.
